WRITING.TEXT: I'm not entirely sure. Being less introverted might help me find a girl but idk. Thinking about being in a relationship led me to thinking that I'd probably constantly think I'm not good enough for whoever I'm with.
Thank you for your comments, I really appreciate it
Thank you for that, I really appreciate it
Thank you, this means a lot to me

I hope you're right and my post can maybe help some people by giving them some form of comfort knowing that other people are going through similar situations. At least then I can be useful to someone.
Thank you, I'll have to think about all of this more
Thank you for your advice

I get what you mean. I do the same thing everyday too, where it gets especially worse once I get in bed and start thinking about the same things repeatedly. Just try to focus on what good or enjoyable things happened during your day, no matter how small the things are. Sometimes it helps me so I hope it helps you.

Maybe try just being honest and open with your friends. In my personal experience, people appreciate it when I'm straightforward and truthful so then they don't have to guess what might be the issue. I hope this helps you.

I wouldn't worry too much, if they're really your close friends, they'll still care for you even if they're a little annoyed. After all who doesn't get a little annoyed with their friends every once in a while
Thank you but honestly I don't think any of my friends are close enough to talk with me about stuff like that
I'll think about it, thank you for the advice
Thank you I'll try to use your advice
Thanks that means a lot to me
Thank you
Interesting, thank you
I still have some hope that I could one day but I'm skeptical
Yeah it does. A lot
Thanks for your advice I'll think about it, but frankly I don't feel like anything will work at this point
I'm the exact same way and about to be 20, I don't really have any advice except maybe have faith that you'll find someone one day
You sound like a very interesting person. I hope you find someone that suits you :)
Glad you're feeling better, keep up the good work :)
Why do you think you'd be murdered? Also by past life do you mean like when you were younger or something? Sorry for the questions lol you don't have to answer if you don't want
Gotcha, that's pretty interesting. So like do you remember anything from a previous life or ?
Huh. That's pretty cool, I wish I could remember stuff from a different life's perspective or like their experiences
I bet that's pretty useful. I'm glad for ya!
Maybe, but even then we don't really talk
We're just not that close anymore I guess and we're normally busy
I have one but it likes everyone else more. I'm the least favorite :/
I'm trying to be patient but I've never had a gf and I'm about to turn 20 and it sucks
I wish I did mean something to myself but frankly, I wouldn't care that much if I died tomorrow
Maybe I can some day but I feel like I'm just destined to suffer
Thank you, maybe you're right but I've been this was for a long time now so idk
Thank you for all the advice. Most of the time I'm really alone like in the woods or just alone in my apartment, my self hatred just gets even worse so idk
Thanks but I'm not very good at talking to other people and I'm pretty introverted
Why?
I'm the same exact way except I think more about suicide than starting a new life elsewhere
Pushed away the only girl I actually had a chance with and then barely talk to people bc of social anxiety and being introverted
Thank you, I hope things get better for you soon
Thank you, it's really hard for me to not think of the past because it's just me and my thoughts everyday and they always bring me back to the past
Thank you but I'm having a hard time working towards a future when I'm not sure I'll even have one
I don't know if I can ever do that
Thank you
Thank you
I've tried thinking positive but the negative thoughts always take over

Thank you, lately I've just been heating up a knife and then burning my chest with it but that still doesn't seem like enough to me. It makes me feel a little better in the moment since I deserve it but idk
Just because of my mistakes, especially when I failed someone or disappointed someone. That and because I'll never be good enough to have someone I care about
Idk, I don't think I'm worth that much, if anything.
I hope so but I don't think people think I'm worth anything
I'll try but idk if I can think of that many positive thoughts lol
Thank you, I'll give it a try

Well, I kind of do let my problems hurt me. Ive never talked about any of my problems with anyone I know. I've only posted on here. Anyway don't worry it didn't sound superficial and thank you for the comment
Thank you, I'm glad I helped you no matter how much I did

Thank you, I'm just not sure if I'll improve over time because it seems that I've just been getting worse over time. Like you said a year ago I was just depressed but now I'm deeper into my depression and even started self harming not too long ago.
Thank you for the advice but I almost feel like I deserve scars. Idk that's probably weird
I'm glad you found something that helps you out, hopefully I can find something that can help me too

Thank you. I wish I had higher self confidence since I think girls like that but I don't have any reason to have any confidence. So yeah that's one of the reasons I'll never have anyone and it's a reason I hate myself. I guess it's just a loop for me
Thank you, I'll think about it and maybe try some of your advice
Thank you, I've been working out for a while now but lately it doesn't make me feel any better so idk
A lot, I've gotten a lot stronger but I don't look much different.
I've started eating healthier too but I haven't eaten that much lately. I think my depression has really limited my appetite
Thanks, I don't really know how to love myself so idk
Thank you, I'll try to use your advice but it's really hard to not compare myself to others when pretty much everyone compares other people they see to everyone.
I'll try but I haven't done that great in a long time

WRITING.TITLE: Rain
WRITING.TEXT: This is probably going to sound pathetic but I don't really care at this point. Pretty much everything that happens nowadays reminds me of how I'll always be alone and deserve nothing but suffering. It started raining today and all I thought was how is never have someone to stay inside out of the rain with and just hang out with all day and spend time together. I don't know how but my screwed up mind led me to then thinking that even if I do by some miracle find a girl, I'd deserve for her to abuse me. The second I thought that, I knew that it was true. If I ever find someone, I deserve for them to abuse me, emotionally, physically, whatever. Between how lonely I am and how much I don't deserve happiness, I'm fine with that. At least someone would get some enjoyment from my suffering rather than nobody get anything from it. I'm sorry for my sick mentality but oh well.
Thank you for the advice, I'll try to follow it
Thank you
Thank you but I don't think I'll find anyone that can give me love. I haven't so far and don't really have much hope left
I'll try but I'm so damn tired of being alone and I doubt it will happen for me
Thanks but idk if I can wait that long, it already feels like it's been a lifetime
I feel the same way, I'm only about to be 20, but I know it's probably never going to happen.
Thank you but I don't feel like I deserve it

I'm pretty much the same way. Never dated anyone and very introverted so it's hard for me to try and talk to new people and attempt to get closer to someone I just met. I'm in my second year of college now and I didn't really talk to anyone in my first year unless we worked together on a group project.

I'm the same way. I deserve the misery I live in and even worse. Just wanted you to know that you're not alone in that mentality. I've had some people tell me I'm too hard on myself but I think I deserve even worse. Anyway I hope you feel better and can get to a better state of mind and maybe start thinking you deserve better, which you do.
I'd be down to talk about those
Thank you but I still feel like I deserve it. I hope maybe one day I feel better but I don't see that day in sight
I'm just a big disappointment to some people and really screwed up a chance at being with the only girl I've ever loved. She was my best friend since I was 6 years old and I ruined it
Thank you for your advice, I'll think about it
Me too

Yeah this is me, nobody in my life knows what I'm going through but I'm too anxious to try to talk to them. I feel like they'll either not take me seriously or start treating me differently and I don't want that. I just want someone that I can be really close to and then talk to

I've had voices like this in my head for a long time. Telling me to hurt myself, kill myself, that I'm not worthy of anyone, that I deserve to suffer. Sometimes they win and I cave into self harm or just berating myself. Only advice I have is to try and tune out the voices. Keep trying to ignore them because for me they keep coming back to wear me down. Hopefully for you they'll eventually stop but just don't let them win. Try to focus on something good
Your welcome, just keep trying and don't give up like I have.

I know it's difficult but try to keep going. I've never told anyone about my cutting or depression and I've hid it for a long time. It may seem like nobody cares about your depression but I'm sure people care for you. I like to think I'll maybe find someone one day and that helps but I know that's not likely to happen. Anyway I hope you can feel better soon

Don't worry about it. Most of the time people ask questions to the professor in my classes, I learn something from their answer anyway. Or sometimes I had the exact same question as the person who asked it. Anyway a lot of questions just means you have an inquisitive mind and probably think more than the people around you.
I felt this post 100%. I've never had anyone be close to me and I hate it. That's literally the only thing I want in this world rn
Idk, my brother is better than me in almost every way and all I've done is disappoint.

I'm fairly certain I live in my own world lol. I've had the same few friends for years now and I've never been to a party and have never felt an ounce of desire to go to a party. Just not my kinda thing
He's stronger, more athletic, smarter, better looking, funnier, etc. And my parents always compare my grades to my brothers since I always fail to have grades as good as him.
Thank you, I hope I do
I'm so close to having no hope but thank you anyway
I'm the same way. I'm about to be 20 but when I was a little younger I didn't want a gf that bad. Nowadays it's all I want. I just want someone to be with.
I agree. Im literally lonely all day everyday and I think a significant other would help me get better. I hope you find someone
I can talk to you about anything, dm me anytime if you'd like to
I feel the exact same way. I hope you can find a way to forgive yourself or value yourself more. I know it's really difficult but try to keep going.
Thank you it's going to be hard for me
I just don't have a lot in common with people around me and I'm kinda shy so
I'll think about it. Thank you
A bit of both I guess
Yeah, this virus isn't exactly helping either tho
Don't really have a social life so now I'll have even less lol
I'm the exact same only I can't cry myself to sleep. I just try to block everything out and sleep for a few hours every night.
I think of this all the time. Just wishing that someone would really care for me. I hope your fantasy comes true.
I feel you. I don't think I've even been hugged since about 5 or 6 years ago
I do the same. I'll carry out entire conversations with myself
I'd say the voices in my head if I had to pick a factor of my depression. But I can't really say it pisses me off cuz I deserve all of it
I'd like that
Even if I did find a hobby, I have no time for it now that college started up again. I won't have time to do anything enjoyable for months. Thank you for the advice tho

I know what you mean. I've never talked about any of my problems to anyone I know because I don't want them to pity me or even concern themselves with my problems. I've always thought it best to just pretend to be alright. This is just what I do though because I don't really trust anyone enough to even tell them I'm struggling. I guess what I'm trying to say is that I don't talk to people I know about my issues, but that doesn't mean that's the right thing to do. Maybe for you, you need to talk to someone to get better. Personally I'm not sure that would help me so I've never tried it. I hope you can figure out how to feel better.
I'll think about it.
Same
Me too
Okay thank you, I might have to get some cuz I'm miserable
Haha mishap or fortune?
Sure seems like it'd be fortune
I'll think about it thanks
I'm the same way. So glad I can just wear a mask now
I've basically given up. The virus makes it even harder than it would've been to meet people.
Idk, it feels like I'm meant to be alone
Yeah. Thank you
Thank you. I'm the same way rn. I'm not hot or rich or whatever so yeah nobody wants me
Same here, I hope you get one
Pretty easy to go along with that since I'll never have a wife, let alone a gf lol
You can talk to me if you want
You can talk to me if you want
You can talk to me if you want
Please don't, please talk to me
I don't have any advice cuz I'm in a somewhat similar situation but I hope you get the help you need
I'm not sure who actually thinks college is fun but uh my experience is that it is hell

Personally, my depression is just a repeated beat down of myself in my mind, followed by self harm, not eating, barely sleeping, and what used to be suicidal thoughts every once in a while turned into every day. I still care about what happens to other people and stuff but couldn't care any less about what happens to me. I've been laying awake at night hoping that the next day I'd die in some accident or even just get murdered. Then after I think of how unlikely that is, I debate how I should kill myself. I still have energy to do stuff, just no motivation. Idk I guess that's a glance at what my depression is.
Same, I hope you can eventually feel better
I used to do that too. Never really worked for me and idk what else to try so I just don't really talk to anyone anymore. I hope you can find someone to be with.
I'm glad I could be of help to you and no I'm not on any medicine
Well I've never been to a therapist and nobody in my life even knows I'm depressed
Thank you, I appreciate it
Same, hope you find someone
Coming from someone that self harms, just listen to him and try to be understanding as to why he hurts himself. I guess just try to be there for him if he needs you. I hope this helps you.
Facts
Good question. Still haven't found the answer to that myself. I've found more answers to why I should die than why I should live.
I know what you mean. I lay awake at night with the same thoughts running through my head every single night. Then I think about the same things during the day.
Same
Don't worry, I'm the same way so there's at least one person that's in the same situation.
Yeah sometimes I feel like a monster because of all the shit I hear
Failure and hurting people I care about. Couldn't care less what happens to me but I never want to hurt anyone I care about
Facts. Straight facts right there
I'm in my second year
Idk. To do a major/minor type of thing I'd have to change majors cuz there's no way I could minor in something at the same time as my current major
I have no idea
Yeah I'll see, thanks
Please don't. Believe me you are not useless, no matter how much you may think so
It's still about the same, I've lost 20 pounds in the last month. And no I haven't been to a therapist or anything like that.
As far as means of coping go, I don't have any good ones, but I hope you find someone to be with
Same, I hope you find someone
This is me 100%. I hope you find someone
I feel like it is a waste of my life. What's the point in living if you're all alone and have no one to share your life with
Thank you and I'll try, but I haven't felt happiness or any worthiness in my life in a long time and I don't feel like it'll come anytime soon.
Thank you
Me too
Don't worry about it too much man. I'm 6'1 and I've never had a gf
Hate when that happens everyday
Idk about greedy. Everyone should have someone like that to be with. I feel the same exact way as you
Damn I'm on hard mode too lol. I hope you find someone
I'm usually just alone in my apartment so I can message just about anytime, feel free to message me if you want :)
Thanks but I can't really tell my family and ask to get therapy
You would think so but idk
Me too. I hope you find someone
Wanna talk?
I've given it a chance several times but I've been crushed each time, but thanks anyway
No it's alright I'm just saying I'm tired of trying to be patient and hope life gets better
Me too, idk why I guess we're just very unlucky
Me too
I self harm and that makes me feel a little better but aside from that basically just lay awake at night hoping I die the next day. So I don't really cope well
Me too and I hate it. It's more painful than anything else I've experienced
It's ok. I want to stay strong but idk if I'm strong enough. I've already come close to killing myself a few times and I fear I might one day. I hope you're stronger than me
Idk if I can believe that but I'll try. Thank you
God this hurt to read cuz it sounds exactly like me only difference being I'm a guy and still in college
I'd be happy to talk with you if you'd like to :)
Sure thing just message me whenever :)
Happens to me all the time, but I don't really have any advice on how to avoid it or get over it. I hope you can get over those moments
Same
Name: Tyler Age: 20 Where I'm from: Originally, Wisconsin, but now I'm in the south My question: Which is your favorite mission impossible?
I'm kinda in the same situation so please try to keep hope that you'll find someone, or someone will find you
I know what you mean. The other day it had just been getting worse and worse until I think I just broke and couldn't feel anything for a while. I hope you feel better soon
I'm the same way, I hope you can feel better and stop thinking negative
Alrighty, have a nice day :)
Yeah for me I just went back to feeling depressed so idk which is worse honestly, the feeling nothing or just feeling depressed all the time

I'm glad you're still here

I don't mind and no I can't talk to anyone about this
Sorry to hear that but I feel like I'll end up dropping out soon unless I do something else first

As of now I see it like this: I can either continue to suffer my way through college and possibly graduate (very skeptical at this point), or I can kill myself instead of being a failure to my family. And yes I know they'll see me as a failure for killing myself but at least I won't have to go through them talking shit about me and being disappointed in me for the rest of my life.
I don't think any future I work towards will be happy so idk

Would you like to talk?
Why? What's wrong? If you need someone to talk to or just someone to listen, I can

Please don't go through with your plans. I know it seems like what you've done will follow you forever but you said you're in high school right? And given your 4.6 gpa I'm assuming you're going to college. I'm in college right now and believe me, nobody cares about anything that happened in high school once you've moved on to college or getting a job or whatever. Everyone's too busy to care about that anymore so please don't give up. Also if you plan to go to college, if it's not in your town, it's fairly unlikely you'll see people from high school. I hope you can get through this and live.
Did you delete the post? That may help as far as background checks go
Yep I get them all the time

Well if it comes up during your background check, maybe you can explain what happened. I know you said it's pretty much an immediate deterrent, but can you really know for 100% certainty until you apply? Maybe they won't find out about it or maybe they'll give you a chance to give your side of the story
I understand. All I'm saying is that there's still a chance you can get in

I understand. In my opinion, I'd say it's worth the effort. You're clearly very smart so it's not worth it to give up now. Don't let your talent go to waste. Regardless of your political views, people can't deny your intelligence with a 4.6 gpa. I'm sure you can easily get into a ton of colleges if you can't get into the naval academy. As for going to school, I'd say talk with a teacher or principal in regards to your safety. I know you think they might not care to help because of what you did, but they're not doing their jobs if they're not protecting all students. If going to school really isn't a viable option, can you do your work online?

It might be best to do it online just to be safe then. As for being alone, just try talking to a few new people on here or something, eventually you'll click with someone and can talk with them a lot more. I guess for your best friend just try to get a feel for when you can talk to her. Like don't pressure her to talk or anything just kinda ease into a conversation if shes up to it
No problem, happy to help anytime. Good luck with everything :)
I'd be happy to talk if you'd like :)
Yes I'm the same way and I also don't know what to do since I don't want to live
